review_details: We go with Nikos, his wife Froso and Simon to the FishingTrip it was great ... best food fresh from the Ocean, very interesting to see the work of fishermen, speaking about living on milos and the traditions ... beautiful places for swimming! and looking!!! Snacks, fishsoup, baked fishes, greek coffee, yoghurt with homemade sweets and watermelone, Drinks how much we want and a Ouzo before leaving the boat!!! A very nice and perfect day! Thanks so much Anita and Bernd.... a „must to do“ staying in Milos
